DUnitX.TestFramework Classes

Classes
 NameDescription
Assert

Represents type Assert.

CustomTestCaseAttribute

Base class for all Test Case Attributes.   

CustomTestCaseSourceAttribute

Base class for all Test Case Source Attributes.   

EAbort

Represents type EAbort.

ENoTestsRegistered

Represents type ENoTestsRegistered.

ENotImplemented

Represents type ENotImplemented.

ETestFailure

Represents type ETestFailure.

ETestFrameworkException

Represents type ETestFrameworkException.

ETestPass

Represents type ETestPass.

IgnoreAttribute

This attribute will prevent a test from being run.   It will still show up in the lists of tests, and reported as an Ignored test

IgnoreMemoryLeaks

This attribue is applied to test methods. If a test is successful and produces a memory leak it will be reported.   If you do not want the leak reported, then you can add this attribute to the test method.

RepeatAttribute

Marks a test method to be repeated count times.

SetupAttribute

A method on a test fixture decorated with this attribute will run before each test method is run. Note that if more than one method is decorated with this attribute the first method found will be executed (not recommended!).

SetupFixtureAttribute

A method marked with this attribute will run before any tests in.  Note that if more than one method is decorated with this attribute the first method found will be executed (not recommended!).

TDUnitX

Represents type TDUnitX.

TearDownAttribute

A method on a test fixture class decorated with this attribute will be run after each test method is run. Note that if more than one method is decorated with this attribute the first method found will be executed (not recommended!).

TearDownFixtureAttribute

A method marked with this attribute can contain a teardown method that will be run after each all tests in the fixture have executed.  Note that if more than one method is decorated with this attribute the first method found will be executed (not recommended!).

TestAttribute

This attribute marks a method as a test method

TestCaseAttribute

The TestCaseAttribute allows you to pass values to a test function. Each value is delimited in the string, by default the delimiter is ','

TestFixtureAttribute

A class decorated with this attribute will be tested. The parameters allow you to control which methods are treated as tests. By default  only methods decorated with the Test attribute are run as tests.

TestInOwnThreadAttribute

A TestFixture decorated with this attribute will be tested using it's own thread.  This can speed up unit testing when fixtures do not compete for resources and the test machine has enough cores to service the tests.

TTestFixtureHelper

This helper class is intended to redirect the writeln method to a test runner so that it is logged correctly.

TTestFixtureInfoList

Represents type TTestFixtureInfoList.

TTestInfoList

Represents type TTestInfoList.
